articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian First Deputy FM
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian First Deputy FM

					Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from Andrey Denisov, first deputy foreign minister of the Russian Federation on a visit to the DPRK.
					
					The gift was handed to Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, by Andrey Denisov Thursday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Meets Delegation of CPC
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Meets Delegation of CPC

					Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Thursday met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Communist Party of China headed by Guo Shengkun, secretary of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Regional Committee of the CPC.

articles.title: WPK Central Committee Hosts Reception for Chinese Party Delegation
articles.content:
WPK Central Committee Hosts Reception for Chinese Party Delegation

					Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Thursday hosted a reception for the delegation of the Communist Party of China.
					
					Present there on invitation were members of the delegation headed by Guo Shengkun, secretary of the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Regional Committee of the CPC, and staff members of the Chinese embassy here.
					
					Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, and officials of the WPK Central Committee were present there.
					
					Kim Yong Il said in his speech that the historic meeting between the top leaders marked an important occasion in boosting the friendship and unity between the two parties and peoples of the two countries and putting spurs to socialist construction in the two countries.
					
					Noting that the Chinese people are greeting the 90th anniversary of the CPC and the centenary of the 1911 Revolution of China, he wished them  greater successes in carrying out the tasks for this year, the first year of the 12th five-year plan, under the guidance of the CPC.
					
					Guo said that the Korean people are registering great successes in various fields of socialist construction under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. We are sincerely rejoiced over them as close comrades and friends, he stressed.
					
					He expressed belief that the diligent and resourceful Korean people would significantly greet the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung under the leadership of the WPK headed by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Russia Takes Measures to Prevent Tidal Wave Damage
articles.content:
Russia Takes Measures to Prevent Tidal Wave Damage

					Moscow, September 28 (KCNA) -- A large-scale training for preventing damage from tidal wave began in Vladivostok, Russia, on September 27.
					
					The training involved units under the Ministry of Emergency in Maritime Territory and Khabarovsk along with fire brigades, rescue squads, medical workers, Pacific fleet's seamen and experts of public organs. 
					
					The training is aimed to discover and rescue victims in the sea, render medical assistance to them and put out fire in vessels.    
					
					A tidal wave warning and evacuation training is also planned in coastal areas of Vladivostok.

articles.title: Official Publications Should Not Be Liberal: Russian PM
articles.content:
Official Publications Should Not Be Liberal: Russian PM

					Moscow, September 28 (KCNA) -- Official publications of Russian government bodies should not become liberal, Prime Minister Vladimir Putin said. 
					
					He made the remarks at a meeting of the United Russia Party held on Sept. 23. 
					
					What the federal or regional bodies need are official publications openly expressing their official views, not liberal publications camouflaging themselves as official and independent ones, he added.
